articles.title: New Drug for Cannabis Use Disorder Shows Promise in Early Trials in Humans - Scientific American

articles.content: For people who find themselves unable to control their cannabis consumption, treatment options are limited. The Food and Drug Administration has not approved any medications for cannabis use disorder… [+7212 chars]
